PlantsDetails.desc:
Description of Anniversary special succulent pair

    Succulents are perfect to provide structured and textured look to garden. Succulents are low maintenance plants and are perfect to gift your loved ones as you are gifting something that grows.
    Just add water when soil in pot is dry and keep them at location receiving 4-6 hours of direct sunlight and these plants will bring smile on your face with their beautiful features.

This pack contains the following items

Name Price Quantity
Standard greeting card (Pink)151Details
Marble Chips Pebbles (White, Small, Polished) - 50 Gm101Details
Elephant bush, Portulacaria afra, Jade plant (Green, Small) - Plant1991Details
Crassula Campfire - Plant2491Details
3.4 inch Marble Finish Round Ceramic Egg Pot No.688 (White)3582Details
3.3 inch Marble Finish Round Ceramic Plate For 3.4 inch Egg Ceramic Pot (White)1602Details

Benefits of this pack

  • You get 2 succulents + 2 Ceramic pots + 2 Ceramic plates + Pebbles + Gift card in a single pack.
  • Succulents are easy to care for plants and require low maintenance.
  • Succulents can be kept indoor at a location receiving bright light.
